snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally time for The Frostpunk 2 Official Gameplay Trailer! 

❄️Add #Frostpunk 2 to your wishlist: http://re.11bits.com/t90

#Frostpunk #TheCityMustNotFall 

Discover a city-survival game set 30 years after an apocalyptic blizzard ravaged Earth, transforming our world into a harsh, icy wasteland. In #Frostpunk 2, you must face a new deadly threat that appears on the horizon – human nature and its unsatiated thirst for power.

#Frostpunk 2 will launch on PC in the first half of 2024 and will be available day one with PC Game Pass and later with Xbox Game Pass upon release on Xbox Series X|S. The game is also coming to PlayStation 5.
